short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Document test environment data and user interactions in the browser with our exploratory testing tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Here's how it works:
1. Record your working session.
2. Capture screen actions and generate trace steps to reproduce defects.
3. Review and Edit recordings.
